document.full_text: the european central bank's interest rates are very low and a scaling down of its support measures is warranted, a senior ecb policymaker said on tuesday but another played down the risk from inflation.
document.title: ecb's stark says rates very low, bonello dovish
lines_and_colors: the european central bank's interest rates are very low and a scaling down of its support measures is warranted, a senior ecb policymaker said on tuesday but another played down the risk from inflation.
